pages.text: Toy Poodles were originally bred for circus and entertainment purposes, as well as serving as family dogs.$(br2)At less than half a block tall, these graceful dogs come in five different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in around warm water. They can also be found in plains biomes.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Salmon Treat.
